vote.text: Amendment SA 3569 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3569 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S8796-8797; text: CR S8796-8797) To provide a complete substitute.
